product_name: Amphipod Vizlet Smiley Reflectors - Yellow - Package of 2
long_description: This package of 2 yellow Amphipod Vizlet Smiley Reflectors equips you with bright, wearable flashing LED reflectors for enhanced visibility in dim light. Versatile magnetic closure makes it easy to wear on your waistband, hydration belt, pack strap, sleeve, collar, vest or hat. Easy on/off operation with the press of a button; included coin-cell battery can be replaced easily. The Amphipod Vizlet Smiley Reflector weighs less than 1/2 oz. for featherlight visibility.
short_description: This package of 2 yellow Amphipod Vizlet Smiley Reflectors equips you with bright, wearable flashing LED reflectors for enhanced visibility in dim light.
